short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to filter phrases that annoy you in government-style redaction (thick black lines).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that allows you to filter words from the internet a la government redaction style (thick black lines).
